Dear {!Contact.Name}
Graduate Research Supervisor Accreditation at Level 2
It is with great pleasure we confirm your Graduate Research Supervisor Accreditation at Level 2. Your accreditation certificate is attached for your records.
Ongoing Professional Development
There are a number of opportunities for experienced research supervisors to develop and hone their supervisory skills. These professional development master classes and good practice workshops are available all year round and facilitated by experienced research supervisors and relevant experts.
All graduate research supervisors are encouraged to visit the Research Supervision Accreditation Program Booking System to view the current list of offerings and to make a booking.
Resources for Research Supervisors
There are numerous resources for research supervisors which you are welcome to access at any time.
Code of practice for supervision of doctoral and research masterâ€™s candidates, which all research supervisors should remain familiar with, Supervision resource page, Monash e-Research, Data Storage and Management, and Monash Supervisor Accreditation FAQ's.
Once again we'd like to congratulate you on your accreditation. If you would like to learn more about Monash research supervisor accreditation and professional development, you can visit the website or contact us at MIGR-Membership@monash.edu.
